website_summaries.verdict: A good recoil padding option for older and modern rifles with wooden stocks.
pros: Thick padding helps to tame the recoil and kick for faster shooting and reloading
Comes in different shapes and styles to fit specific rifle models
cons: Included pad screw holes may fail to line up with the holes on the gun's stock

customer_reviews.title: If you have one of the current generation 1895s like me, you need the #10801
customer_reviews.text: THIS PAD DOES NOT FIT CURRENT MARLINS, it is sized for the pre-Remington buyout generation of Marlin lever actions. If you have one of the current generation 1895s like me, you need the #10801. You'll have to drill a new bottom screw hole in the plastic spacer but the pad itself fits pretty much flush on the stock. Luckily for me this #10806 did fit my Mossberg but Limbsaver needs to update their size charts as far as the new Marlins are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: 10806 fits well on Mossberg 500C with wood stock
customer_reviews.text: I put this recoil pad on a 20 gauge Mossberg 500C with a wood stock. There was a black plastic spacer between the stock and the original pad, which I left on. The Limbsaver doesn't fit perfectly, it rides about 3/32" higher than the black spacer. You have to be looking for it to notice, because both pieces are black. The material feels like Sorbothane, but it's also hollow and does a very good job cushioning the recoil. The old pad left a light bruise after five rounds in a light tee shirt. The Limbsaver doesn't leave a mark.
customer_reviews.author: solid

customer_reviews.title: Fit issue
customer_reviews.text: This stock made an ENORMOUS difference in my 11 year old daughters 870 compact 20 gauge. She actually enjoys shooting it now. Only complaint is, I spent a LOT of time trying to figure out what model to order and finally printed off the sheets to make sure I had the right one...nope. doesn't fit properly, it's a little bit too big, but it works. Just looks bad. Oh well I guess, I wasn't going through the issue of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TACi

customer_reviews.title: 10806 is great fit for Mossberg 500 wood stock
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good on my 590A1 which has furniture from an '83 Mossberg 500 ATP. This model is not specifically listed by LimbSaver but thanks to their templates available on their website, I was able to choose one that would be a close fit. It took a bit of finagling with a dremel to get the pad to line up properly, but now it looks almost factory. Shot it today and it noticeably reduces felt recoil. I almost forget I'm shooting a 12 gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ong

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 20 gauge 870 youth. The fit is about 98%. Length wise, it's perfect but about a 32nd too small on both sides. I went through all of the patterns on Limbsaver's website and this was the best fit. As for the pad, it's very high quality and significantly reduces felt recoil. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rocklock hunter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because LimbSaver's website and the item's packaging says this model (10806) fits the Marlin 336. It does not. The holes do not line up and the pad is not the same shape as the stock.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Masters

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for a 45/70
customer_reviews.text: This came to me as a comparison piece. I bought a 45/70 Marlin Guide Gun, and then ordered up 7 different pads. When this is the absolute best. Nothing is going to negate a 45/70 recoil, but this sure does tame it down to manageable levels. Best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas in Wa

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit but, overall a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this limb saver 10806 for my marlin 336 .30-.30 Very thick and cushy should help a ton with comfort and recoil. Fitment is the only issue with this product. The holes for the screws were off a little and caused the screws to go in at an angle but caused no issue. There is about a 32nd of an inch of the wood stock sticking out on the edges (Not a big deal) that i may sand down in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Marlin 336 30-30 lever action. Fits perfect exactly what I need. I can do 50 rounds with no issues now.
customer_reviews.author: EricV

customer_reviews.title: Great recoil pad -  ordered the wrong model
customer_reviews.text: Good pad and great price... unfortunately I ordered the wrong one. Amazon took care of the return. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Samuel De Sousa

customer_reviews.title: good fit an nice recoil reduction
customer_reviews.text: being my 4th pad for my rifles , fits great an reduced recoil great
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Know you fit.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit the marlin 336 correctly and i confirmed I bought the one listed for the Marlin.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: They have good templates for finding what kind of part you need
customer_reviews.text: The template they provided helped a lot and this fit my shotgun perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Vince G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Mossberg 535 12 ga, with wooden stock. Easy to install and looks like it was made to my stock's exact specs. Save yourself some time and use the print out templates from Limbsaver's site.
customer_reviews.author: N. GARZA

customer_reviews.title: Good recoil dampener
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good, I use to get a bruise where the stock would kickback, now I dont. Doesnt fit perfectly on a 870 express wooden stock but it's not a show gun, I will buy this again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First time I shot my mossberg 500 i fired 10 rounds of slugs, without this pad my shoulder was bruised up pretty good. With this pad no bruising after 25 rounds slugs and it was actually fun to shoot with the reduced recoil.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: This pad seems like a great replacement for the stock Remington 860 recoil ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad seems like a great replacement for the stock Remington 860 recoil pad. However, it does not fit the Remington 870 Express Wood Stock. I returned it for a slip-on style pad (small). That one fits quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 minute install and it fit as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 minute install and it fit as well as the OEM Remington 870 recoil pad. Use a smooth shank screwdriver and some lubrication and it will prevent the shaft of the driver from tearing up the two screw holes in the recoil pad.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my marlin 336 30/30
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a quality product, but it didn't fit my marlin 336 30/30 as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Andy O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and easy install! I shoot a 12 gauge pump with 3” slugs for deer hunting and the recoil was extremely reduced compared to the factory installed recoil pad. The reduced recoil helped me maintain focus on the target and avoid muzzle jump.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Budish

customer_reviews.title: Important for newer Marlin 336W owners!
customer_reviews.text: It's well built but i ultimately had to return it due to the holes not aligning with the holes on the buffer pad roughly a quarter inch difference from the holes . This and the recoil buffer did not cover all of the wood on the end of a newer marlin 336W.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Newland

customer_reviews.title: Practical but incorrect information
customer_reviews.text: While it will work, this model does NOT fit the Marlin 336. There will be quite a bit of filing that will have to happen to get it to look correct.
customer_reviews.author: Farmerjp320

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a 336 pre ‘64
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to fitting on a 1962 Marlin 336 in .30-30. Holes don’t line up. Screws are way too long. Maybe it fits later models but not the legacy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent recoil pad..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent recoil pad....Just wish it would have fit..... My stock may be a little small for the pad...Had to return it....No problems dealing with Sportsman Supply.... THANK YOU SPORTSMAN SUPPLY....
customer_reviews.author: Tabascotom

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit on a Marlin 336 as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Marlin 336 and it doesn't even remotely fit. Not sized to the stock or the original holes for the original recoil pad. This might have been sized for an older 336 as mine is a newer one (Remington owns Marlin now). You can see the profiles don't match when I stacked it on the original. Don't buy this for your 336.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for  Mossberg 835 w/ Wood Stock!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Mossberg 835 Ultimate-Mag with a wood stock! Can’t fault it, happy to relieve some of this 3.5” mag impact from my shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: boHopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fit For Marlin 336
customer_reviews.text: Although the product seems to be of good quality, it did not fit my Marlin 336W .... too small.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 1100 however fit is slightly off doesn’t cover the butt completely.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable! Do yourself a favor
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable! Do yourself a favor, replace your recoil pad with Limbsaver. Vendor on time and as advertised. Purchased for three different shotguns
customer_reviews.author: Zeeton

customer_reviews.title: Read descriptions fully
customer_reviews.text: After a slight modification I was able to make a nice fit to my Winchester 94 - 44
customer_reviews.author: Airport1

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my Remington 870 Pump slug gun. It reduced the amount of kick back by 50%. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my Remington 870 youth with wooden stock
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my Remington 870 youth with wooden stock. Very slight overhang but slightly bigger is better than slightly smaller for the purpose of recoil reduction.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great but print out the template from the website and compare to order the best fit
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit a wingmaster
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit a wingmaster like the title says, the screw hole line up but the pad is smaller than the gun stock
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't fit remington 870 wood stock perfectly(medium)
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, i think it will perfectly reduce the recoil power. But it doesn't fit remington 870 wood stock.
customer_reviews.author: vivi

customer_reviews.title: feels great
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install and reduces fatigue while shooting...very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Craig J.

customer_reviews.title: Check your serial number and call Remington to see what fits.
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my Remington 870 but the item itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy loso

customer_reviews.title: ... used it yet but it fits the stock just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet but it fits the stock just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit and is a very soft recoil pad. Great quality as well. Their customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Would've LOVED IT. BUT
customer_reviews.text: Would've LOVED IT. BUT.... SAYS IT FITS MARLIN 336. Too small. Would've had to shape stock down to fit. By alot. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Randoll

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: for recoil its great don't fit 100% but good enough
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: REALLY helped with the recoil on my Remington 870 deer ...
customer_reviews.text: REALLY helped with the recoil on my Remington 870 deer shotgun ( I shoot slugs through it for hunting in the Midwest, no rifle allowed in our state).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: final installation was not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: did not fit my Marlin 336rc as well as advertised. had to drill out mounting holes. final installation was not a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH E. MCDONALD JR

customer_reviews.title: Pretty perfect fit for my rig
customer_reviews.text: The company doesn't list it, but I needed a good pad for a .45-70 1895 GS, and this fit virtually perfect, with no adjustments required. Not saying that it will fit yours, but in searching forums, they said it would fit, and it did. No need to look further for ME.....take the chance, you can always send it back!
customer_reviews.author: S. Garsson

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Marlin 336
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Marlin 336 and as another review that I read today states, too small. The screw holes don't line up and it is a good 1/16" too small all the way around. Giving it one star because it just isn't what was advertised and now I have to deal with returning it and finding something else. Maybe a slip-on will give a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used their template guide to fit pad to a different gun. Pad reduces severe recoil on light magnum rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: After using it for the first time, I realize that this product is over rated, shotgun still kicks like a mule, after only 3 rounds I realized that this isn't much better then the original pad.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel V.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit the Marlin 336 Woden stock for rifles manufactured after Remington took over manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Vance

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fitment.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit Marlin 336 stock as indicated by manufacturer. The screw holes are off by a few mm and don't line up properly like the original pad does. Limbsaver needs to address this issue.

product_meta.title: LimbSaver AirTech Precision-Fit Recoil Pad for Wood Stocks
product_meta.description:
Reducing felt recoil by up to 70 percent, the customized LimbSaver AirTech Precision-Fit Recoil Pad for Wood Stocks is designed to specifically fit a variety of rifles, shotguns, and muzzleloaders. LimbSaver's AirTech line features atmospheric chambers that produce a substantial increase in performance through uniform energy dissipation, and it incorporates anti-muzzle jump technology for faster target re-acquisition. The recoil pad enables you to shoot longer without discomfort and bruising, while also helping to increase accuracy of follow-up shots and provide improved control for maximum stability.

It's made from LimbSaver's proprietary NAVCOM technology (Noise and Vibration Control Material), which effectively absorbs a wide range of frequencies to dissipate energy and vibration. This recoil pad also features a no-slip surface that stays in place even in the rain. See the following for model compatibility:

 * Model 10800 -- Browning Bar Auto, Citori, Fusion, and Gold Auto (all wood stock); CZ Mallard 12-20 gauge (wood); Franchi Alcoine 12-gauge and model 48 (wood), Ruger M77 (wood and synthetic); Ruger Hawkeye (5-1/32 x 1-11/16-inch, synthetic); Ruger No. 1 (some wood); Ruger Red Label (wood); Weatherby Black Stock (5-1/32 x 1-11/16-inch, synthetic); Winchester Supreme Select Sporting O/U (wood); Winchester 1400 (wood); Winchester 670 (wood); Winchester Model 70 Featherweight (wood)
 * Model 10801 -- Browning A-Bolt (youth and ladies wood stock; new short mag synthetic stock); Browning Stalker (synthetic); Browning BPS Upland 12-gauge (wood); Knight TK 2000 (synthetic); Knight 50-caliber Disc. Inline ML (synthetic); Marlin Model 308MX (wood); Mossberg Model 500 Youth (wood)
 * Model 10803 -- Ruger K77/22 All-Weather (synthetic skeleton stock); Sako 75 (synthetic); Finnlight Model A7 (synthetic); Tikka T3 Lite (not Adjustable or Sporter; synthetic); Tikka T3 (not Sporter; wood); Tikka T3 Deluxe and Hunter (wood); Tikka T3 Battue Lite Rifle (synthetic)
 * Model 10806 -- Baikal (some wood stock models); Ithaca Storm (wood); Ithaca Turkey Storm (synthetic); Marlin 444, 4450, 336, and 512 (wood); Mossberg Model 500 A Turkey (wood); Mossberg Model 9200 (wood); Remington 870 Wing Master and 870 Police (wood); Remington 870 Magnum Special Purpose (synthetic); Remington 1187 Special Purpose 1192 (wood); Thompson Center Arms Thunderhawk 50-caliber (wood); Winchester 100 (wood); and Winchester 70 Carbine 30.06 (wood)
 * Model 10808 -- Benelli-Tactical M-1 (re-drill holes in LimbSaver pad; synthetic stock); Ithaca Model 37 (1970s and older; wood stock); Parker Hale 7mm Mag (wood); Remington 700 ADL/BDL (4-7/8-inch flat wood); Remington 7 CDL and 700 CDL Large (4-7/8-inch wood); Remington 1187 (wood/laminate); Ruger American Ranch 300 BO (synthetic); Ruger M77 Mark II Compact (laminate); Savage A17 (synthetic); Winchester 88 (some wood models); Winchester 12 Heavy Duck (wood)
 * Model 10809 -- Browning Citori English 1981 (wood stock); Mossberg models with 5-3/16-inch butt stocks (500A, 535, 835, 930, and 935; synthetic); Mossberg Maverick 88 12/20 gauge (synthetic); Mossberg 590A1 and 590 Special Purpose (synthetic); Mossberg 100ATR Rifle White Tail Lightening (wood); Winchester Coyote (laminate)
 * Model 10810 -- Baikal (some wood stock models); Benelli-Non-Tactical Super Black Eagle (wood and synthetic stocks); Benelli R1 Big Game Rifle (synthetic); Benelli Sport 1 and Sport II (synthetic); Benelli-Non-Tactical M-1 Field 12-gauge (wood and synthetic); Benelli Montefeltro 12-gauge (wood); Benelli-Non-Tactical Nova (synthetic); Benelli-Non-Tactical Super Sport, MII and Cordoba 12-gauge (synthetic); Benelli 20-gauge Ultralight Satin Walnut with WeatherCoat (wood); Benelli Super Vinci (synthetic); Franchi Verimax 912 12-gauge (synthetic); Franchi Auto 12-gauge (synthetic); Franchi O/U Alcoine (wood); most Stoeger 12-gauge models (synthetic)
 * Model 10811 -- Beretta 5-3/8-inch stocks (DT11-692 Sporting, Competition; wood and synthetic stocks); Blackhawk SpecOps NRS, Axiom UL, and Axiom TH (synthetic); FNH FN SC 1 (wood); some Stoeger models (wood)
 * Model 10814 -- Browning X-Bolt and AB3 (wood and synthetic)
 * Model 10815 -- Browning BPS Upland 20-gauge (wood); Thompson Center Arms Encore Pro Hunter, Omega ML, and Black Diamond (wood); Weatherby Vanguard 243 and Series II (synthetic)




Using state-of-the-art technologies, LimbSaver produces highly effective noise- and vibration-dampening products for archery and firearm products, including bow stabilizers, recoil pads, rifle slings, and more. Proudly engineered and hand-made in the USA, LimbSaver products are widely used by outdoor enthusiasts, military, law enforcement, and more.
feature_bullets: Model 10806 -- Fits Ithaca, Mossberg, Remington, and Winchester models (see product description for details)
Easy-to-install recoil pad helps reduce up to 70 percent of felt recoil, increase stability for improved control
Atmospheric chambers produce a substantial increase in performance through uniform energy dissipation
Made from LimbSaver's proprietary vibration-dampening NAVCOM material; non-slip surface for use in all harsh weather conditions
Incorporates anti-muzzle jump technology for faster target re-acquisition
